thread.section_title: Monceau Wagram Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent value for money
thread.title_full: Excellent value for money - Review of Monceau Wagram Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Paolo D
title: Excellent value for money
text:
The first thing that got my attention when I booked my room was the word "romantic" in the room description,and indeed it was:a nice view on the roofs of Paris and a heart made of rose petals on an old style bed!
The thing that impressed me the most though was the friendliness and professionalism of the staff,especially the smiley Asian lady,who was quick to respond to any wish from my fiance (who is pregnant,so quite picky with food and how it's cooked).
All the people working at the reception have been very attentive too and there was no problem with any of our request!
Surely I do not need to comment further on the location:two very close tube station and the close proximity to the arc De triomphe make it a good recommendation to anyone visiting paris with a little bit of a budget stretch.
Surely excellent value for money
